mapper.select: SELECT skin_color,skin_role FROM skin WHERE skin_user_no = ( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId});

SELECT room_name, room_present, room_max FROM room WHERE global_room_no in ( SELECT joining_room_no FROM joining WHERE joining_user_no = ( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ) group by global_room_no;

SELECT room_name, room_present, room_max FROM room WHERE global_room_no in ( SELECT joining_room_no FROM joining WHERE joining_user_no = ( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_name = #{userName}) ) group by global_room_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO joining VALUES(( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}),( SELECT global_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name = #{roomName}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET room_present = room_present+1, room_max = room_max+1 WHERE room_name=#{roomName};
